occupation: Chief Financial Officer at IGY Immune Technologies & Life Sciences Inc.
headline: CFO, IGY Immune Technologies & Life Sciences Inc.
summary:
Offers a broad base of experience in finance, accounting, and strategy with particular emphasis on recurring revenue.  Adept in  acquisitions, and culture amalgamation of organizations across a wide variety of businesses. Experienced in leading M&A activities from both the buyer and seller side including the raising of growth capital. Considers himself an ‘operations professional’ as he prefers to dig deep and understand the fundamentals rather than just report what happened. 

Professional leader with extensive experience in sales driven; profitable, customer focused operation.  Financially and Strategically astute consultant with a clear focus on the bottom line.  Creative and Entrepreneurial by nature.  Employs a strong work ethic with creativity and a vision for the development of a successful enterprise.

Specialties: Financial, Professional designation, Marketing - branding and sales, recurring revenues - customer acquisition and retention, project management, Logistics and transportation expert.

experiences.company: IGY Immune Technologies & Life Sciences Inc.
experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description: IgY Life Sciences, is determined to revolutionize healthcare through the science of IgY Technology. We are a biotechnology company focused on developing and manufacturing novel, immune-based products. Our mission is to actualize the promise of IgY Technology to enable humans and animals to live healthy lives.

experiences.title: Board Treasurer
experiences.description: The World Petroleum Council; Canada has successfully bid for the 2023 World Petroleum Congress to come to Calgary, Canada!  This is a huge energy conference that brings together the worlds leaders to discuss the future and exchange technological innovations.  We are actively planning for the event in the Fall of 2023 which will focus on Energy Transition!

experiences.title: Vice President Of Business Development & Operations
experiences.description: Critical Control and Gas Solutions Empower Better Decision making through the solving of Oil & Gas measurement challenges.  We provide leading edge software and exceptional customer service – we are not a software provider – we are solution that supports ESG scores and better industry practices.

experiences.title: Vice President Business Development & CFO
experiences.description: Noralta Technologies is a remote monitoring software technology company that turns 'data into knowledge'.  Supporting the resource sector throughout North America, Noralta boasts a highly flexible and usable software platform that saves operators money in travel, equipment, and improves site safety and environmental practices through remote monitoring.

experiences.title: Board Member
experiences.description: Board Member, Treasurer, CKUA Radio - an incredibly eclectic and unique Alberta-wide FM station playing the kind of music you can't hear anywhere else!

experiences.title: Vice-Chair
experiences.description: Volunteer vice-chairman of the Hockey Calgary Board.  Also Chair of the Marketing and Sponsorships committee devoted to building the Hockey Calgary brand, promoting Hockey in Calgary as a great sport and, ensuring kids have fun and are safe playing the sport in Calgary!

experiences.title: CFO
experiences.description: Providing high level financial planning and direction to the new media company.  Drawing on past experiences in media and supporting the operations and selling teams in the exciting new venture!

experiences.title: Financial Business Consultant (CFO)
experiences.description: Riata Partners is a dynamic management consulting practice that offers strategic planning, functional support, and shift management to complete successful initiatives in a variety of industry sectors and across a number of functional areas. Riata provides skills typical of business advisory groups, and is able to engage other Riata Business Groups to leverage their expertise in areas such as marketing, human resources, administrative services and technology (web design, social media, etc.) This results in an objective multi-faceted approach to help business owners optimize their growth and operations including; Business Advisory services, Operational Management, and Contract CFO/Controller roles.

experiences.title: CFO
experiences.description: Providing high level financial direction and mentoring to a leading edge integrated creative agency committed to creating Persuasive Experiences™ for the digital age. Karo is incredibly strong in strategy, insights, planning and Branding.  I work with a very talented and bright group of people which makes the job of finance that much easier.

experiences.title: Board Member
experiences.description: Supporting the development of local hockey talent and helping players 'live the dream' of graduating to play at the college level in Canada or the USA.

experiences.title: COO / Controller
experiences.description:
Meridian is a Canadian merchant banking firm that provides corporate finance advisory services and access to private capital to established, mid-market companies.

Working with independent business owners and public companies to understand their capital needs to assist them in the growth of their operations or facilitate the purchase of a competitor or integration opportunity.  Offer professional advice on the company direction and how to maximize returns to shareholders including setting themselves up for a monetizing event.

experiences.title: President
experiences.description: Operating as a professional change and organizational consultant.  A mentor, operations expert, and finance professional.  Lead Strategic planning sessions in the restructuring of companies in the courier and entertainment businesses including the evolution of their operations to a higher level – dealing with increased activity, organizing marketing and promotion activities, hiring of quality of staff, and accounting for the activity in an appropriate way.

experiences.title: President
experiences.description:
DMX is a music supplier, and professional audio/video systems designer, and installer.  A highly transactional business connected to commercial establishments across North America.

As President, built and maintained strong a customer focused group responsible for the promotion and retention of key accounts in both official languages. Grew customer base from zero to 8,000 customers - the nations largest commercial music supplier.  Developed a process management and technical response protocol that ensured best-in-class response time in the country. Maintained customer churn levels below industry standards by building customer satisfaction and additional service purchases. Built an operations and fulfillment network across the country that worked closely with users to better enhance their environments including the use of Web-based e-commerce back office programs intended to both up sell and fulfill orders.

experiences.title: General Manager
experiences.description: Marketing and project management in the development and launching of the new concept of commercial free, digital music, to residences and commercial establishments in Canada, considered leading edge. Developed an entrepreneurial atmosphere to seize the opportunity for growth within a highly competitive market space by focusing on customer needs.  A profitable enterprise within a short 3-year period

experiences.title: Director of Customer Operations
experiences.description:
Videotron communications was a leading example of a customer ‘friendly’ operation in the face of considerable negative feelings toward cable companies and their use of negative option marketing.  The operation grew significantly with the introduction of new technologies and customer facing programs. 

Managed annual recurring billings in excess of $32mm from customers through out Alberta. Developed and built a highly effective and successful Marketing, Sales & Customer Service department resulting in the highest penetration of premium services in the country. Successfully introduced ‘Videoway’, Canada’s first interactive set-top terminal “box” resulting in industry leading penetration rates for a set-top device.

education.school: Chartered Professional Accountants of Canada (CPA Canada)
Cornell Johnson Graduate School of Management

education.activities_and_societies: Theta Chi Fraternity member, Zeta Gamma Chapter

certifications.name: CPA
certifications.authority: Chartered Professional Accountants of Canada (CPA Canada)

recommendations:
Kourosh Assef



I've had the distinct pleasure of working for Brad in a number of capacities.  His open, engaged, and authentic leadership style inspires a strong following.  His commitment for excellence and accountability, are only second to his passion for his clients and results.

I miss his wisdom, experience and mentorship and know that he deeply influenced my career path and success.

Graham Duff



Brad and I have worked together on a number of occasions all the way back to his days in cable TV. Brad has always proven to be an effective leader, motivator and creative thinker always with an eye on the needed bottom line results. I would recommend Brad for a postion in any organization that would benefit from these qualities...
